price: 33. C’est ainsi qu’est le supplice. Mais le supplice de l’autre monde est plus grand encore. Ah, si seulement ils pouvaient savoir !
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika al-ʿadhābu walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati akbaru law kānū yaʿlamūna
